external_games.name: The Armada SpaceShip Combat Fleet is Here! Help the Armada Fleet to Landing!

name: The Armada SpaceShip Combat Fleet is Here! Help the Armada Fleet to Landing!
summary: The Armada SpaceShip Combat Fleet Is Here! Help The Armada Fleet to Landing! is a space game with great animations, challenges, and graphics! Featuring more than 600 "space ships" at the same time, and many levels! During the game you can play your own music!
